quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Love and American Style
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, network, posters. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: The first episode of Love, American Style was the TV debut of this future TV star.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Flip Wilson

questions.question: The Love, American Style episode called Love and Happy Days was the basis for the hit show Happy Days.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: How many Emmy Awards did the anthology series Love, American Style win?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 2

questions.question: This was the main sponsor of the TV series Love, American Style.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Oscar Mayer

questions.question: On which network was the show Love, American Style aired?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: ABC

questions.question: Which of these female singers did not guest star on Highlander: The Series?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Courtney Love

questions.question: An episode of this show featured a museum called The Louvre: American Style.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Simpsons

questions.question: What are the first lines of the theme song for the TV show Love, American Style?

options.text: Love, American Style, its a tonic tried and true.
Love, American Style truer than the Red, White, and Blue.
Love, American Style, its fun to look at ourselves as other people do.
Love, American Style, theres no hocus pocus youre just in focus, youre the stars  today.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Love, American Style truer than the Red, White, and Blue.

questions.question: In Highlander: The Series, Joe Dawson, played by Jim Byrnes, was a member of what secret organization that kept a written history of the Immortals, pledging to observe their affairs but never interfere in them ?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Watchers

questions.question: Find the TV show that cannot trace its origins to Love, American Style.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Love Boat

questions.question: Highlander: The Series left the air in 1998 after six seasons and 119 episodes produced.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Joe Barbera and Bill Hanna, of cartoon fame, were writers on Love, American Style.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: The 1987 movie Running Man showed posters for Love, American Style.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: When was the show Love, American Style on the air?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1969-1974

questions.question: In Highlander: The Series, the character of MacLeods friend Hugh Fitzcairn was played by what British rock star?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Roger Daltry

to put him in her will
